tilesmallfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	kerning 2
	spacewidth 10

	! #00514
	"\"" #00515
	# #00516
	$ #00517
	% #00518
	& #00519
	' #00520
	( #00521
	) #00522
	* #00523
	+ #00524
	, #00525
	- #00526
	. #00527
	/ #00528
	0 #00529
	1 #00530
	2 #00531
	3 #00532
	4 #00533
	5 #00534
	6 #00535
	7 #00536
	8 #00537
	9 #00538
	: #00539
	; #00540
	< #00541
	= #00542
	> #00543
	? #00544
	@ #00545
	A #00546
	B #00547
	C #00548
	D #00549
	E #00550
	F #00551
	G #00552
	H #00553
	I #00554
	J #00555
	K #00556
	L #00557
	M #00558
	N #00559
	O #00560
	P #00561
	Q #00562
	R #00563
	S #00564
	T #00565
	U #00566
	V #00567
	W #00568
	X #00569
	Y #00570
	Z #00571
	[ #00572
	\\ #00573
	] #00574
	^ #00575
	_ #00576
	` #00577
	a #00578
	b #00579
	c #00580
	d #00581
	e #00582
	f #00583
	g #00584
	h #00585
	i #00586
	j #00587
	k #00588
	l #00589
	m #00590
	n #00591
	o #00592
	p #00593
	q #00594
	r #00595
	s #00596
	t #00597
	u #00598
	v #00599
	w #00600
	x #00601
	y #00602
	z #00603
	"-{" #00604
	| #00605
	"-}" #00606
	~ #00607
}

tilebigfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	kerning 6
	spacewidth 10

	! #00696
	"\"" #00714
	% #00701
	' #00714
	, #00695
	- #00621
	. #00694
	/ #00700
	0 #00622
	1 #00623
	2 #00624
	3 #00625
	4 #00626
	5 #00627
	6 #00628
	7 #00629
	8 #00630
	9 #00631
	: #00699
	; #00698
	? #00697
	A #00632
	B #00633
	C #00634
	D #00635
	E #00636
	F #00637
	G #00638
	H #00639
	I #00640
	J #00641
	K #00642
	L #00643
	M #00644
	N #00645
	O #00646
	P #00647
	Q #00648
	R #00649
	S #00650
	T #00651
	U #00652
	V #00653
	W #00654
	X #00655
	Y #00656
	Z #00657
	\\ #00700
	_ #00621
	` #00714
}

smallfont2
{
	ignoreoffsets
	kerning 1
	minluminosity 0
	spacewidth 6

	! #00718
	"\"" #00719
	# #00720
	$ #00721
	% #00722
	& #00723
	' #00724
	( #00725
	) #00726
	* #00727
	+ #00728
	, #00729
	- #00730
	. #00731
	/ #00732
	0 #00733
	1 #00734
	2 #00735
	3 #00736
	4 #00737
	5 #00738
	6 #00739
	7 #00740
	8 #00741
	9 #00742
	: #00743
	; #00744
	< #00745
	= #00746
	> #00747
	? #00748
	@ #00749
	A #00750
	B #00751
	C #00752
	D #00753
	E #00754
	F #00755
	G #00756
	H #00757
	I #00758
	J #00759
	K #00760
	L #00761
	M #00762
	N #00763
	O #00764
	P #00765
	Q #00766
	R #00767
	S #00768
	T #00769
	U #00770
	V #00771
	W #00772
	X #00773
	Y #00774
	Z #00775
	[ #00776
	\\ #00777
	] #00778
	^ #00779
	_ #00780
	` #00781
	"-{" #00808
	| #00809
}

digifont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	minluminosity 0

	0 #01657
	1 #01658
	2 #01659
	3 #01660
	4 #01661
	5 #01662
	6 #01663
	7 #01664
	8 #01665
	9 #01666
}

indexfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	minluminosity 0

	% #00722
	/ #00713
	0 #00702
	1 #00703
	2 #00704
	3 #00705
	4 #00706
	5 #00707
	6 #00708
	7 #00709
	8 #00710
	9 #00711
	: #00712
}
